itemDisplayName: Deploy a simple Linux VM in an EU datacenter
description: This template allows you to deploy a simple Linux VM using a few different options for the Ubuntu version, using the latest patched version. It uses a SSH Public Key and also copies your public key to root.
summary: This template takes a minimum amount of parameters and deploys a Linux VM, using the latest patched version. It uses a SSH Public Key and also copies your public key to root
